argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod B ) e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | #P_modge0 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> 0 <_ ( A mod B ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_modlt | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod B ) < B ) |
| 4 |  | #P_0re | |- 0 e. RR |
| 5 |  | #P_rpxr | |- ( B e. RR+ -> B e. RR* ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> B e. RR* ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elico2 | |- ( ( 0 e. RR /\ B e. RR* ) -> ( ( A mod B ) e. ( 0 [,) B ) <-> ( ( A mod B ) e. RR /\ 0 <_ ( A mod B ) /\ ( A mod B ) < B ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod B ) e. ( 0 [,) B ) <-> ( ( A mod B ) e. RR /\ 0 <_ ( A mod B ) /\ ( A mod B ) < B ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 8 | #P_mpbir3and | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod B ) e. ( 0 [,) B ) ) |
